author: rinaldo
title: Finally the green ninja arrived!
review:
It finally arrived! yes, the fifth ninja: Lloyd, introduced this year by the LEGO Ninjago series from a few days it became part of my collection (or rather that of my son).
Of course I am referring to the set of the 9574 series Trottole Ninjago, practically impossible to find in any store and wanted by all the Ninjago lovers.
Like all LEGO Ninjago Spinners made ??in 2012, set 9574 inside is provided with the new type of spinner that allows the mounting of armor enhancement (booster pack) and a ring crown with green blades mounted on the top of the spinner.
In the set are also provided gold weapon on which can be applied to the two knives green (supplied), two standard weapons, a character card and four battle cards.
The minifig Lloyd is provided in the set complete with dark gray armor, and except for the color, it stands out from other Ninjago minifig series Zx.
The minifig, like the other NINJAGO is well done and the only care must be taken to the helmet where playing the gray star scratching tends to lose the color.
Please note that the minifig Lloyd Green Ninja is given, in addition to this set, only in the set 9540 battle with the dragon, therefore, these are the only two alternatives for those who want to complete the series of Ninjago minifig.
At this point you just have to play, waiting for the 2013 where (as confirmed rumors out on the web) should get a ninja gold.
